Events.Text: Your task is written on the left panel. [instruction 1 of 4]
I want to play some trivia. I am going on celebrity Jeopardy next week. I can't reveal my identity because I am a Grammy award winning rapper actor and I need to keep that on the down low.
number
At what question would you like to start?
I would like to start at number five. That's how many Grammy awards I have.
Engage in some smalltalk. [instruction 2 of 4]

Scenario.UserTask: You would like to play a game of trivia. You've already answered some of the questions, so you should start from question 5 and play 5 questions. You have answers for the following questions: (10) airlock, (6) three, (9) briquette. For the rest, try your best!
Scenario.WizardTask: Let the user play a trivia game. Query for and ask the questions until the user wants to stop. Note: Please DO NOT CHANGE THE COMPARATOR for the question number, i.e. leave it as 'is_equal_to'.
